description:
Easy little trail, a little twisty and tight.  Follows the Elbow River.  Starts in the Paddy's campground (or highway when gated for season) and comes out at the highway a couple/three km West.

Works well as a lead-in to Elbow Valley (and then on to Sulphur Springs, etc.)
Thie trail is right beside:
directions:
South Calgary, go west on Hiway 22x, keep going west after Bragg Creek. Park at Beaver Lodge or Powderface lots, 17.2km W of the second Bragg Creek road. Start from the Paddy's Flats parking lot.

Look for a trail along the river bank going West.
title: Riverview (Paddy's Flats)
